name: Two Bois
description:
Made by the Inexperienced VuVuu Inc. Duo-Squadron, 1 Artist (KaeGore)  and 1 coder(Teritian).  

Music By RFS (Discord: RFS#4451)

All Code, Art, and Music was made during the Jam, Sound effects were made using SFXR.  A Video of the Process will be uploaded within the next few days to the VuVuu Inc YouTube Channel.

The Theme was Two Sides, so we made a game where there are two sides to the puzzle, and you have to flip between them to be able to escape with both of the characters.

Thanks for playing

Ps. A Dev log will be uploaded to the VuVuu Inc. YouTube Channel very soon

*If the web version doesn't load/work, please download the zipped files*

Controls:

W.A.S.D - Move

G - Grab / Drop

E - Enter / Interact

Q - Flip Sides

R - Restart

M - Menu

Ctrl - Close keymap menu

They are also in the game level
